item.title: Deploying a Machine Learning development environment in less than 5 minutes
item.description: In this blog post, I am going to show you how to deploy an AWS instance with a Machine Learning development environment using Terraform. Pre-Requisites To follow the tutorial and use the Terraform script provided, you need the following. AWS account and user credentials: You can create an AWS user for free here and in addition, you need to have a private/public key pair that is associated with your AWS user.
